name: prosemirror-changeset
description: Distills a series of editing steps into deleted and added ranges

scripts.build-readme: builddocs --name changeset --main src/README.md --format markdown src/*.js > README.md
scripts.release: git checkout -b release && npm run build && npm run export && git add -A && git commit -m "Release $VERSION" && git tag -m '' $VERSION && git push --tags && git checkout master && git branch -D release
